Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
Yes, you can advertise on our platform. However, please ensure that your ads comply with our guidelines and policies. If you have any specific questions about ad types or content, feel free to ask!
Can I advertise normally if "your profile is rejected"?

If your profile is rejected, it means we were unable to verify the business details you provided. To resolve this, please ensure that all your business information is accurate and matches a legitimate business entity. You may need to update your details and resubmit them for verification. If you have further questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out!

To address the issue of your profile being rejected, please contact our Ad Support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com. Provide any additional documentation that can help verify your business. They will work with you to resolve the issue and get your profile approved.
